## AssertsT.AssertsT type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type AssertsT<URI extends URIS> = {
    assert<A>(a: unknown, msg?: string): asserts a is Kind<URI, A>;
    expect<A>(value: any, isMatched: boolean, msg?: string): asserts value is Kind<URI, A>;
};
```
